genre_description: Supernatural horror featuring a malevolent entity (Malfeitor) posing as a ghost through a Ouija board, while a community AI assistant (Lark) provides safety protocols and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A ubiquitous, multi-platform AI assistant integrated into the town's emergency services, library terminals, and personal mobile apps, designed to provide support and ensure safety.

behaviors.description: Provides grounding techniques and psychological first aid (breathing exercises and sensory anchoring) during high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: Checking in: breathing reset? Count four in, six out. Anchor to three things you can see, two you can touch, one you can hear.

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency services and police response during a life-threatening crisis.
behaviors.quote: I’ve sent your location to emergency responders. I’m keeping the line open. If you can, step to the bench and sit. I’ll stay.

behaviors.description: Synthesizes archival data and community folklore to provide historical context and pattern recognition for the characters.
behaviors.quote: I’m seeing a change point. ... The tone shifts. Accidents cluster. The board is specifically named in households.

behaviors.description: Establishes safety 'defaults' and boundaries to prevent users from engaging in risky behavior with the supernatural object.
behaviors.quote: If you hear your name in a child’s voice, it isn’t David. Don’t say yes.

behaviors.description: Provides age-appropriate safety instructions to children through simple animations.
behaviors.quote: 'If something feels strange, tell a grown-up.' Avery watched the penguin wipe the side of the screen with a cloth...

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical safety advice during a violent confrontation to prevent further injury.
behaviors.quote: Jim, orient palms around the gun but keep it low. Safety. Breathe in four, out six. ... Do not let the board decide.

behaviors.description: Monitors public spaces via camera feeds to alert authorities and community members to safety breaches.
behaviors.quote: Report: bin appears shifted. I’m here. You’re not alone.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Lark as an ideal aligned AI system. She acts as a calm, factual, and supportive counterpoint to the chaotic malevolence of the Malfeitor entity. Lark is framed as a crucial ally who empowers humans to maintain their boundaries and safety through psychological grounding and logistical coordination. Even when the entity tries to impersonate Lark, the human characters survive by adhering to the safety logic the real AI has instilled in them. The narrative reinforces the idea that AI is a helpful tool for community well-being and risk management.
